title: The Papers: Foreign workers drive and Lilibet becomes princess
description: Plans to attract workers from abroad and the christening of the Sussexes' daughter lead the papers.

title: Emma Hayes urges pregnancy support in WSL as Melanie Leupolz makes Chelsea start
description: Women's Super League clubs need to do more to help players who have babies, says Chelsea manager Emma Hayes.

title: Bayern Munich 2-0 Paris St-Germain (3-0 agg): Hosts cruise into Champions League quarter-finals
description: Bayern Munich cruise into the quarter-finals of the Champions League as they condemn Paris St-Germain to another last-16 exit.

title: Elle Edwards: Three arrests in connection with fatal shooting at pub
description: Elle Edwards, 26, was shot in the head while celebrating with friends at a pub on Christmas Eve.

title: Chelsea Women 3-1 Brighton & Hove Albion Women: Blues move up to second in WSL
description: Chelsea put their Continental League Cup final defeat behind them by beating managerless Brighton to move one point behind WSL leaders Manchester United.

title: Tottenham 0-0 AC Milan (0-1 on agg): Spurs out of Champions League after shutout
description: Tottenham are knocked out of the Champions League in the last 16 as they are unable to find a way past AC Milan and draw their second leg 0-0.

title: Nicola Bulley: Man, 34, arrested over police scene footage
description: Man is held on suspicion of malicious communications offences and perverting the course of justice.

title: Celtic rally to beat Hearts in Postecoglou's 100th game

title: Budget 2023: 'My energy bills have doubled to £3,000 in a year'

title: Five women sue Texas over abortion access
